Savory Steakhouse is a fine dining interpretation of the classic American steakhouse with hints of Japanese influence laced into the menu. It is a welcome addition to the dining scene, receiving numerous awards and accolades since its opening in 2005. Filet Mignon topped with Shrimp Sauce Grilled Salmon Elegant Interior Design Menu Our new restaurant in San Mateo will be opening in October! Happy Hours Special from 9-12 is back!
